scripts.clone_to_s: ssh asmi@45.80.69.237 " cd www && git clone -b master https://github.com/asmi046/autoprioritet-nuxt"
scripts.pull_to_s: ssh asmi@45.80.69.237 " cd www && cd autoprioritet-nuxt && git pull https://github.com/asmi046/autoprioritet-nuxt"
scripts.build_in_s: ssh asmi@45.80.69.237 "cd www && cd autoprioritet-nuxt && npm run build"
scripts.restart_in_s: ssh asmi@45.80.69.237 "cd www && cd autoprioritet-nuxt && pm2 restart nuxt-prod"
